meta_description: Explore Clark County's rich history at the Clark County Historical Museum in Vancouver, WA. Step back in time with engaging exhibits, interactive programs, and captivating storytelling that bring the region’s past to life. Start your journey into the past today!
hours_text:
Have you ever wondered where the PNW’s love for hops and IPAs began? Or who was the first female riverboat captain on the Columbia? Have fun and meet others every First Friday while exploring our community’s history during #CCHMuseum AfterHours! 

Each monthly event showcases a different theme with experiences such as pop-up exhibits, workshops, live performances, author readings, and more. While you’re here, be sure to explore our award winning exhibits to learn about the women who helped build Clark County or dance through the history of music in our community.

See below for upcoming #CCHMuseum AfterHours events.

#### WHEN

Monthly on the first Friday from 5pm – 8pm

#### 

#### LOCATION

Clark County Historical Museum

1151 Main Street, Vancouver, WA 98642

## UPCOMING

admission_text:
## Support Our Mission

Become a Member

## Why Become a Member?

Support our mission. Support local history. Your membership directly supports our exhibitions, educational programs, and helps to preserve the Museum’s collections and make them accessible to the community. These collections are an integral part of Clark County’s story.

## 

## Every Membership Includes:

  *     *       * Free admission to the Museum
      * Free or reduced admission to Museum programs and events
      * Discount at the Museum Shop
      * Invitation to exclusive Members Only events

**NEW!** Don’t let your membership expire. Click the “Recurring” button to have your membership renew automatically! Already renewed? Contact [outreach@cchmuseum.org](mailto:outreach@cchmuseum.org) to setup automatic renewals.

**_If you have any questions about or difficulties with purchasing your membership or donating online, please contact our Executive Director Brad Richardson at[director@cchmuseum.org](mailto:director@cchmuseum.org) or (360) 567-8552._**

## **Join Clark County Historical Museum Today!**

### General Membership

Formerly Individual/Family

Members make everything we do possible! Joining, renewing, or gifting a membership directly supports the humanities in our community. Memberships go towards staffing costs, the care and maintenance of the collection, community partnerships, programming, and more.

Click a link below to explore our different membership levels and learn all that a CCHMuseum...
collections_text:
## Keepers of History

Clark  
County  
Historical  
Museum

[Get Involved](https://cchmuseum.org/get-involved/)

;



#### WHAT WE DO

The Clark County Historical Society (CCHS) was established in 1917 to assist in the preservation of historic sites. Today, we are a vibrant museum featuring exhibits, talks, and events focusing on local stories across all segments of Clark County’s history. We embrace those memories and care for the history being written everyday, so they are never forgotten.

[Learn More](https://cchmuseum.org/mission/)

## EXHIBITS

Take a walk through our galleries and learn more about Clark County and the people who have shaped the place we call home.

## Walks

Explore the history of Clark County through our guided tours in and around the community.

## Talks

Engaging speakers and topics selected to pique your curiosity and deepen your knowledge of our shared story.
